Html: Why is it that when I use the default Adobe Catalogs for Ready, Acrobat and Flash approve an update it will eventually disappear in the WSUS Package Publisher. I need to change the approval or modify the installation but it is not listed under my Updates anymore. If I go to Updates--Manage Catalog Subscriptions they are there but I have to import the updates again in order to see them in WPP. Any suggestions?

Nervermind, found the solution in another thread. Had to go to Tools--Settings--Updates Tab and check "Show Locally-Published Updates that are also visible in WSUS console". Then Reload the connection.
